name: Linx (itch)
description:
Linx is a video game that challenges the player through dynamic puzzles that are solved by grouping boxes in a 5 * 5 grid scenario. It is based on the psychological processes that the game generates according to  Brian Sutton-Smith model to generate entertainment and pleasure. Its purpose is to generate entertainment by activating mental and physical processes that generate fun and challenge.

W,A,S,D to move
